task.title: Creating a Frame
task.shortdesc: Frames are the primary container for design elements such as shapes, texts, and images in Figma.

taskbody.prereq:
Pre-Requisites:
Have an image to import. Currently, Figma supports JPG, PNG, GIF, WEBP, and HEIC formats.
Different image formats are ideal for different image types. (link to file type ref topic can go here)
taskbody.steps:
1. Open a new Figma workspace. 2. Navigate to the toolbar located at the bottom of the page. 3. Select the Frame Tool, located in the second dropdown menu from the left.
Fig. 1: The dropdown menu, with three options 4. Resize your frame by dragging its corners.
